0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 300
Innate: Heimerdinger gains  20% bonus movement speed while near an allied  turret or a  H-28G Evolution Turret or  H-28Q Apex Turret deployed by him.
0.html: Innate: Heimerdinger gains  20% bonus movement speed while near an allied turret or a H-28G Evolution Turret or H-28Q Apex Turret deployed by him.
markedPassages: 20% bonus movement speed
turret
H-28G Evolution Turret
H-28Q Apex Turret

0.text: COST: 20 MANA + 1 TURRET KIT

1.text: COOLDOWN: 1

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28G Evolution Turret at the target location, which lasts until destroyed.
0.html: Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28G Evolution Turret at the target location, which lasts until destroyed.

1.text: Heimerdinger periodically stocks a Turret Kit charge, up to a maximum of 3.
1.html: Heimerdinger periodically stocks a Turret Kit charge, up to a maximum of 3.

2.text: Up to 3 H-28G Evolution Turrets can be deployed at a time, with those deployed beyond the maximum destroying the oldest one.
2.html: Up to 3 H-28G Evolution Turrets can be deployed at a time, with those deployed beyond the maximum destroying the oldest one.

3.text: See Pets for more details about H-28G Evolution Turrets.
3.html: See Pets for more details about H-28G Evolution Turrets.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about H-28G Evolution Turrets.

0.text: COOLDOWN: 1

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

0.text: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28Q Apex Turret at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.
0.html: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28Q Apex Turret at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.
markedPassages: UPGRADE!!!

1.text: H-28Q Apex Turret scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
1.html: H-28Q Apex Turret scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
markedPassages: UPGRADE!!!'s

2.text: See Pets for more details about the H-28Q Apex Turret.
2.html: See Pets for more details about the H-28Q Apex Turret.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about the H-28Q Apex Turret.

1.text: COOLDOWN: 11 / 10 / 9 / 8 / 7

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each one dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy  champion grants 20% beam charge to all   turrets within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.
0.html: Active: Heimerdinger unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each one dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy champion grants 20% beam charge to all turrets within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.
markedPassages: champion
turrets

1.text: Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing 20% damage, increased to 40% against  minions.
1.html: Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing 20% damage, increased to 40% against minions.
markedPassages: minions

0.text: COOLDOWN: 11 / 10 / 9 / 8 / 7

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

0.text: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger launches 4 waves of 5 rockets in quick succession to the target location, each one dealing magic damage. Enemy  champions and  monsters are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth.  Minions take 100% damage from every rocket.
0.html: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger launches 4 waves of 5 rockets in quick succession to the target location, each one dealing magic damage. Enemy champions and monsters are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth. Minions take 100% damage from every rocket.
markedPassages: UPGRADE!!!
champions
monsters
Minions

1.text: Hextech Rocket Swarm scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
1.html: Hextech Rocket Swarm scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
markedPassages: UPGRADE!!!'s

0.text: COST: 85 MANA

1.text: COOLDOWN: 11

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger hurls a grenade at the target location that detonates upon impact, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy  champion, all   turrets within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.
0.html: Active: Heimerdinger hurls a grenade at the target location that detonates upon impact, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy champion, all turrets within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.
markedPassages: slowing
champion
turrets

1.text: Enemies hit at the center of the grenade's impact are also  stunned for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Enemies hit at the center of the grenade's impact are also stunned for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stunned

0.text: COOLDOWN: 12

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

0.text: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces a fixed distance 3 times, exploding each time at twice the radius.
0.html: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces a fixed distance 3 times, exploding each time at twice the radius.
markedPassages: UPGRADE!!!

1.text: Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be  slowed and  stunned multiple times if circumstances permit.
1.html: Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be slowed and stunned multiple times if circumstances permit.
markedPassages: slowed
stunned

2.text: CH-3X Lightning Grenade scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
2.html: CH-3X Lightning Grenade scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
markedPassages: UPGRADE!!!'s

3.text: CH-3X Lightning Grenade will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: CH-3X Lightning Grenade will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: CH-3X Lightning Grenade will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: COST: 100 MANA

1.text: COOLDOWN: 100 / 85 / 70

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic ability for an additional effect. These empowered abilities have the same cooldowns as their basic forms, deal modified damage, and do not have a  mana cost. UPGRADE!!! can be recast after 3 seconds, and does so automatically upon casting another ability.
0.html:
Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic ability for an additional effect. These empowered abilities have the same cooldowns as their basic forms, deal modified damage, and do not have a  mana cost.

UPGRADE!!! can be recast after 3 seconds, and does so automatically upon casting another ability.
markedPassages: mana

1.text: Recast: Heimerdinger ends UPGRADE!!! and puts it on a 3-second  cooldown.
1.html: Recast: Heimerdinger ends UPGRADE!!! and puts it on a 3-second  cooldown.
markedPassages: cooldown

2.text: UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
2.html: UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
